title: How did Vātsyāyana figure out the Kama Sutra? - Quora

response.answer_text: As per my knowledge he did not “invented” Kama sutra. He just “copy & pasted” . He learned about these sutras when he visited Kailasa, the abode of Lord Shiva. [1] Lord Shiva by his “personal experience” figured out Kama sutra. He passed it down to Nandhi , from Nandi , Vatsayayana got it. Footnotes[1] Philosphy of Kama Sutra
